publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1327.2 Alex Johnstone: Sustainable Management of Scotland's Marine Environment-As an amendment to motion (S2M-1327) in the name of Allan Wilson, leave out from "; endorses" to end and insert ", but believes that the consolidation of marine legislation is only desirable if it can be achieved while protecting economic and social stakeholders, particularly in the fishing, aquaculture, energy and tourism sectors."
